title: Ted Olson & David Boies: "Redeeming The Dream"
description: Michael's conversation with attorneys David Boies and Theodore Olson, who argued the California Prop 8 case in court together (and were on opposite sides of the 2000 Bush V Gore legal challenges), on their book "Redeeming the Dream: The Case for Marriage Equality." Original air date 24 June 2014. The book was published on 17 June 2014.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Ted Olson, David Boies)
